title: Creative Activity: Our First Puppet Play
creator_credit: Jean Halliday, Lex Halliday and Australian Instructional Films

video_links.name: Creative Activity: Our First Puppet Play

brief_description: A classroom film describing the steps in the production of a puppet play by primary school children. Shows the various stages in production: planning of story and action; choosing puppets; making props and backdrop; preparing stage; allotting parts; rehearsing; finally, the finished puppet show.
